Plugin to generate jars with module information as Maven Plugin
Last Published: 2019-05-21  | Version: 1.0
Overview
  • Introduction
  • Goals
  • Usage
  • FAQ
  • JavaDoc
Examples
  • Jar Example
  • Jlink Example
  • Javapackager Example

jar-module:javapackager

Full name:

com.mt-ag.tools.maven:jar-module-maven-plugin:1.0:javapackager

Description:

Implements the goal javapackager. Javapackager calls the javapackager command. Before it is done, it copies all needed jar to the module dir. Than it tests if the jars are automatic modules, if so it generates the module-info and adds it to the jar.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Requires dependency resolution of artifacts in scope: runtime.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: package.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
<appDescription> String - The description of the app.
Default value is: A short description of the app.
User property is: appDescription.
<appMenuGroup> String - The name of the menu group.
Default value is: my vendor.
User property is: appMenuGroup.
<appName> String - The name of the app.
User property is: appName.
<appVendor> String - The name of the vendor.
Default value is: my vendor.
User property is: appVendor.
<nativeType> PackageMojo$NativeType - The generated installer type.
Default value is: image.
User property is: nativeType.
<openmodule> boolean - Maven parameter to set if it generates an open module or a standard module.
<title> String - The title of the app.
User property is: appTitle.

Parameter Details

<appDescription>

The description of the app.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: appDescription
  • Default: A short description of the app

<appMenuGroup>

The name of the menu group.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: appMenuGroup
  • Default: my vendor

<appName>

The name of the app.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: appName

<appVendor>

The name of the vendor.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: appVendor
  • Default: my vendor

<nativeType>

The generated installer type.
  • Type: com.mt_ag.jar.module.PackageMojo$NativeType
  • Required: No
  • User Property: nativeType
  • Default: image

<openmodule>

Maven parameter to set if it generates an open module or a standard module.
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No

<title>

The title of the app.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: appTitle
